homepage.hero-description: SOMI is committed to protecting the fundamental rights of consumers and minors who use online services. Learn how we work below.
homepage.who_part3: The Foundation for Market Information Research (SOMI) is a non-profit organization set up to
homepage.who_part6: SOMI investigates abuses, informs the public, and helps disadvantaged people. SOMI does this, among other things, by conducting collective proceedings and claiming compensation.
